title: Echoes of the Vanished
outcome: Hundreds of disappeared citizens—the 'vanished'—reveal themselves to Stenograd, exposing what life beyond the BCI is truly like. Their stories and self-governed 'non-score zones' inspire others to opt out, threatening the very foundation of algorithmic governance and forcing a dramatic reckoning within the Council.

events.description: 'Vanished' citizens quietly reveal themselves to their neighbors with visible markers, sharing life stories from outside the BCI.
Citizens gather at open forums where the 'vanished' describe the risks and freedoms of life without scoring. Curiosity and hope mix with fear.
Multiple neighborhoods vote to become 'non-score zones,' refusing BCI oversight and forming their own rules. The Council hesitates, fearing escalation.
Council debates emergency crackdowns versus negotiation. Directorate officers clash with Innovators over how to deal with spreading dissent.
The 'vanished' movement reaches critical mass; protests and marches demand the right to choose a life beyond algorithmic governance. Stenograd faces a potential citywide split.
